RelatedSentence: New Delhi , May 19 : The Supreme Court today granted three weeks ' bail to Tehelka founder - editor Tarun Tejpal , accused of sexually assaulting a junior colleague , to perform the last rites of his mother .
However , he could n't attend the cremation or perform the last rites apparently because of delay in completing the bail formalities .

The bench of Justices B.S. Chauhan and A.K. Sikri granted bail to Tejpal after senior counsel U.U. Lalit mentioned his mother 's death around 1.20 pm in the open court .
